title: UPDATE: Victim's name released in Hart Co. shooting investigation
content:
HARDYVILLE, Ky. (WBKO)-- 12:38 a.m.
Kentucky State Police have released the name of the victim in the investigation of a Hart County shooting.
Around 7:30 p.m. KSP got a call about a possible shooting at 507 North Jackson Highway in Hardyville.
When officers arrived on scene they found Christopher Holder, 57, of Cave City in the property with a gunshot wound to the chest.
Holder is in critical, but stable, condition at the Vanderbilt University Medical Center.
The investigation is ongoing.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kentucky State Police is currently investigating a shooting in a Hardyville residence.
Details are limited and we have a reporter on the way to the scene.
We will continue to update this story as details become available.
